Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs. It comes with a range of features that promise to enhance your experience and efficiency. Given its quality and functionality, I believe it's worth more than its face value. I am offering it to you for $200, considering the value it can bring to you. Please let me know if this offer suits your budget and expectations. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $200. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $200
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $150
